passives.name: Rapid Fire Extension
passives.desc:
Mastery requirement for Rapid Fire to become Rapid Fire+ reduced by 1

When using Rapid Fire:
 ‚Ä¢ Moderate BRV damage boost
 ‚Ä¢ Self: 4 turns MAX BRV Up I„ÄÅ ATK Up I

When using Rapid Fire+:
 ‚Ä¢ Slight BRV damage boost
 ‚Ä¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 ‚Ä¢ Marginal INT BRV Down boost based on number of BRV attack hits
 ‚Ä¢ Slight MAX BRV Up boost„ÄÅ duration +2
 ‚Ä¢ Self: 6 turns ATK Up II
 ‚Ä¢ Triggers additional HP attack on target after use
passives.short_desc: Rapid Fire Extension: Boost to Rapid Fire

passives.name: All Buffed Attack Boost
passives.desc: Moderately raises party's MAX BRV„ÄÅ ATK with active buffs
passives.short_desc: All Buffed Attack Boost: Raises party's MAX BRV„ÄÅ ATK

passives.name: Wind Drake Arrow Extension
passives.desc:
When using Wind Drake Arrow„ÄÅ Wind Drake Arrow+:
 ‚Ä¢ Triggers additional ranged BRV attack after BRV granted based on INT BRV
 ‚Ä¢ Slight boost to BRV granted based on INT BRV
 ‚Ä¢ Wind Drake's Ward duration +2
 ‚Ä¢ Adds BRV Regen to Wind Drake's Ward

After using Wind Drake Arrow„ÄÅ Wind Drake Arrow+:
‚Ä¢ BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (grants party BRV based on own INT BRV after BRV attack) for 6 turns
passives.short_desc: Wind Drake Arrow Extension: Boost to Wind Drake Arrow

passives.name: Tenacity Resonance
passives.desc: Slightly raises party's INT BRV„ÄÅ ATK
passives.short_desc: Tenacity Resonance: Raises party's INT BRV„ÄÅ ATK

passives.short_desc: All BRV Rejuvenate Boost Extension: Boost to All BRV Rejuvenate Boost

passive.name: All BRV Rejuvenate Boost Growth
passive.desc: All BRV Rejuvenate Boost use +1\n\nAll BRV Rejuvenate Boost effect duration +2
passive.short_desc: All BRV Rejuvenate Boost Growth: Boost to All BRV Rejuvenate Boost

When using Rapid Fire+:

passive.short_desc: Hunter's Insight: Boost to Rapid Fire

When using Wind Drake Arrow„ÄÅ Wind Drake Arrow+:
